This weather alone is harsh enough, but now we're dealing with an increasing number of vengeful wraiths and bonded bone imps from Thulsa's army.

Their shrieks are sending the villagers into a panic, and that's never good for any of us.

, bring me the crystals that keep them moving. And shrieking.

Good job!

Now our villagers can sleep at night.

It's all because of you, . Thanks!
Those crystals keep the wraiths and their imps animated. Grab the crystals, destroy the undead. It's that simple.
